title: Real Estate Rental Site KASA
description: This project involved creating a real estate rental website using React. We developed various components and set up routes to enable smooth navigation between different pages, enhancing the overall user experience.

title: Integrating a Figma Mockup
description: In this project, I integrated a homepage for a travel agency using HTML and CSS. I also implemented responsive design techniques to ensure the website functions seamlessly across various devices and screen sizes.
